name: Chocho's Show
description:
The world famous TV show host, Chocho, is preparing for their next guest. Who could it be? Also, I think the studio needs a new desk, quite odd to show the host's legs.

This art piece is part of Vegzi's Hiragana Art World. Note: Collectors from primary market get special limited illustrations #21 and #22 from Vegzi's Hiragana Collection.

Medium: 1080x1080 MP4 without sound / Animated illustration loop / Artist: Vegzi / Twitter: @Vegzi1 / Created and minted: 9th of December 2021
